{"step_by_step_thinking": "HOX genes are known to play a major role in body plan layout and development of many organ systems. According to Document [0], the first two limb malformations shown to be caused by mutations in the human HOX genes were synpolydactyly and hand-foot-genital syndrome, which result from mutations in HOXD13 and HOXA13, respectively.
